meanings.definition: Showing the most signs of weeping
meanings.sent1: The girl's eyes were the weepiest in the room.
meanings.sent2: She always had the weepiest expression when watching sad movies.
meanings.sent3: Even the weepiest puppy couldn't resist her cheerful laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her weepiest moments were like raindrops falling from a stormy sky.
meanings.sent5: The weepiest clouds seemed to mirror her tear-streaked face.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the tissues, the weepiest one was completely soaked.
meanings.sent2: The weepiest scenes in the movie always made her emotional.
meanings.sent3: The weepiest teddy bear looked like it had been through a lot of hugs.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like the weepiest sponge, absorbing all the sadness around her.
meanings.sent5: The weepiest songs seemed to understand her emotions better than anyone.

meanings.sent1: She was the weepiest person at the saddest scenes of the play.
meanings.sent2: The weepiest friend in the group always had a tissue ready.
meanings.sent3: Even the weepiest clouds couldn't match her tears during goodbyes.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like the weepiest river, flowing with emotions.
meanings.sent5: The weepiest moments were when she found beauty in the simplest things.
